introduction_english: The word we'll be learning in this section is そんがい, which you will often hear in situations involving financial discussions, insurance claims, or when talking about reparations for harm caused. Discover how to effectively use this word and broaden your understanding of Japanese language and culture. Make sure to tune in and enhance your vocabulary skills today!
meaning_explanation_english: The word そんがい means "damage" in English. It refers to harm or injury that causes loss or destruction, either in a physical, financial, or reputational context. You might hear this term used when talking about a damaged object, a financial loss, or a negative effect on one's reputation.
kanji_explanation: This word is usually written in kana, so there are no kanji to explain.
synonyms: 損失 : そんしつ : loss
synonym_explanation: The most common synonyms of the word そんがい are ひがい and そんしつ. ひがい is often used to refer to actual harm or damage suffered, particularly by people. It's commonly heard in news about disasters. そんしつ focuses more on losses, especially in financial contexts, indicating a reduction in value or resources.
antonym_explanation: The most common antonyms of the word そんがい are りえき and とく. りえき refers to gain or profit, often in a business context, signifying a positive outcome or advantage. とく is more about receiving benefit or advantage, and it indicates a favorable condition or circumstance distinct from damage or loss.

example_sentences.furigana: 彼(かれ)は損害(そんがい)を受(う)けた。

translations.MY: သူသည် ထိခိုက်ခြင်းကို ခံရခဲ့သည်။

example_sentences.furigana: 台風(たいふう)が損害(そんがい)を与(あた)えた。

translations.FR: Le typhon a causé des dégâts.
translations.MY: မုန်တိုင်းကြောင့် နစ်နာမှုဖြစ်ပွားခဲ့သည်။

example_sentences.kanji: 損害の補償を受けます。
example_sentences.furigana: 損害(そんがい)の補償(ほしょう)を受(う)けます。

translations.EN: I receive compensation for the damage.
translations.ES: Recibo una compensación por el daño.
translations.VI: Tôi nhận được bồi thường cho thiệt hại.
translations.FR: Je reçois une compensation pour les dommages.
translations.TL: Tumatanggap ako ng kabayaran para sa pinsala.
translations.MY: ထိခိုက်နစ္နာမှုအတွက် အစားထိုးပေးစရာကို လက်ခံပါတယ်။
translations.HI: मुझे क्षति के लिए मुआवजा मिलता है।

example_sentences.furigana: 彼(かれ)は損害(そんがい)に会(あ)った。
私(わたし)は損害(そんがい)を被(こうむ)ります。

translations.MY: ကျွန်ုပ်သည် ထိခိုက်မှုကို ခံစားရပါသည်။

damage.MY: ပျက်စီးမှု
